property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-23 Due-ma Start Deck: Miracle Bringer Light Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. {MANA ARMS} 5: if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, each of the chosen creatures don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.
